title: Bug 4971: Strange 'copy package'
description: Bug 4971: Strange 'copy package' issue is observed in the org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui module in the jdt.ui3 project. When the user selects a package and chooses the 'copy' option from the context menu, unexpected behavior occurs. The steps to reproduce the issue are as follows:
SR:
1. Create a new project with the name 'xxx'.
2. In the package viewer, select a package in project A.
3. From the context menu, choose the 'copy' option.
